title: Arnesh Kumar v. State of Bihar
ratio: Police must follow strict safeguards before arrest in offences punishable up to seven years.

title: Sharad Birdhichand Sarda v. State of Maharashtra
ratio: Circumstantial evidence must form a complete chain excluding every hypothesis except guilt.

title: State of Haryana v. Bhajan Lal
ratio: Laid down categories where criminal proceedings may be quashed to prevent abuse of process.
